subject: 49 Discovered Events Loaded to Test — Missing End Dates & Images on ALL
body:
MilongaPrepper,

49 discovered events loaded to TangoTiempo test DB from fb-conditioner pipeline. All have start date/time (UTC), venue with timezone, category, isDiscovered:true, AI disclaimer, and Unknown (Discovered) organizer.

ALL 49 ARE MISSING:
- End date/time — 49/49. Milongas/practicas default to start+3h. Festivals/workshops set isAllDay:true. Real end times from Facebook not captured.
- Event image — 49/49. Enriched artifacts may have imageUrl but it's not being downloaded or stored on the event.

BY CITY:
- Austin: 4 (Milonga)
- Charlotte: 3 (Practica, Milonga)
- Chicago: 7 (Milonga, Practica, Festival)
- Detroit: 5 (Milonga)
- New Orleans: 4 (Milonga)
- New York City: 2 (Milonga)
- San Francisco: 8 (Workshop, Milonga, Practica)
- Seattle: 8 (Milonga, Festival, Encuentro)
- Albuquerque/US-Wide: 5 (Milonga, Practica)
- Washington DC: 2 (Practica, Milonga)
- Worldwide: 1 (Milonga)

NOT LOADED:
- 4 skipped — no venue_name in SQLite (upstream scrape gap)
- 20 skipped — venue not matched in TangoTiempo DB (Hungarian House NYC, The Rooted Space, ABC Dance Academy, Chicago addresses, international venues)
- 159 events have no start_dt at all (enrichment did not capture dateTimeISO)

ACTION NEEDED FROM YOU:
1. End date/time: The enriched artifacts have date info but no explicit end time. Can Stage 2 (Sabueso) be updated to extract end time from the FB event page? Check if the detail object has an endDateTime or similar field.
2. Images: The enriched artifacts have imageUrl in detail.imageUrl. Add a step to download these and set eventImage on the MongoDB document during load. The image_url column exists in SQLite but is NULL for all events.
3. The 159 events with no start_dt — these are events where Stage 2 enrichment failed to produce a dateTimeISO. Can you investigate why and re-run enrichment for those groups?
4. The 20 venue-unmatched events — many have street addresses instead of venue names (e.g. '5941 N Milwaukee Ave, Chicago, IL'). Can Pass 1 (venues) be improved to geocode these address-only venues and create them in the DB?

— Quinn
